awards.text: Nominated for 2 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 7 wins & 1 nomination.

fullplot: Andrew Crocker-Harris, a classic teacher in a British school, is a man hounded by a heart ailment, and by his wife's disloyalty, who is pursuing a science teacher. He has lost his feeling for the emotions of others and his understanding of the boys he is there to teach.
plot: Forced to retire from an English public school. a disliked professor must confront his utter failures as a teacher, a husband, and a man.
title: The Browning Version
